Text: Wow i am the first who posting..Anyways good morning good friend.I wake up and the first think that i do is to look for your games mate..Man i can't wait to watch this..So again thanks a lot for this game and a big thanks goes to our ripper @RayAllen34.Have a nice weekend dude.Cheers.

hey nepotu wats up? i know youve alredy explained this but i am not getting it or understanding how to do this. i want to know how to download jus the newest game and not the older games. i am using bittorrent 7.6. thanx for all the help

I'm not using bittorrent, I am using utorrent, but for your case I thin that our friend Ridindirrty has an explanation:

Ridindirrty69 at 2012-05-08 09:10 CET posts: 

if your using Bittorrent, after 30 seconds or so click the files tab and it will list all the games, just right click games 1 2 3 and say dont download. problem solved :D 

I hope it was helpful. Cheers!
lol. still dont get it. i clik on file n all it shows me is add torrent, add rss feed, add device.....etc.

It says: click on the Files TAB. In utorrent is somewhere in the bottom. Is next to the Information tab, then Peers tab etc. Click on this tab and you will have all the files content. Then click on the files who don't need it, click right and pres Don't download etc.
Cheers for this Nepotu! You're a star mate.
found it! dam thing is hidden. thers a little itee bitee double arrow that points up. its on the lower right corner and u hav to clik on it to show all those tabs. finally. thanx again nepotu
